name: get_synthesize
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool speakeasy.
Tool description: The SpeakEasy API allows you to synthesize speech from text using Google's Text-to-Speech API.
API description: Synthesizes the provided text using the Speakeasy API and returns the corresponding audio URL or response.

text.description: The text to be synthesized into speech.
text.default: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog
